subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Santiago Giraldo beat Sam Querrey, 6-2, 6-4, 7-5, on Friday to give Colombia a 1-1 tie with the United States in their three-day Davis Cup playoff match
snippet: Santiago Giraldo beat Sam Querrey, 6-2, 6-4, 7-5, on Friday to give Colombia a 1-1 tie with the United States in their three-day Davis Cup playoff match
